column3: Agricultural Chemical Usage 2007 Restricted Use Summary: Released May 21, 2008, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, U.S. Department of Agriculture.
*   Area applied is less than 0.5 percent.
1/  Planted  acreage in 2007 for the 11 Program States was 10.2 million acres.
^ ^  States included are AL, AR, CA, GA, LA, MS, MO, NC, SC, TN, and TX.
